stories.name: Ana P.
stories.story: Sun, sand, and seafood - what's not to love? The stunning beaches and cliffs of the Algarve coast were perfect for relaxing. Lagos was a quaint town with delicious seafood and a taste of traditional Portuguese culture.

stories.name: Rui C.
stories.story: If you are looking for beautiful views, stunning architecture, and a good beer? There is only one place to go! Berlin, Germany. A trip we will never forget.

stories.name: Mike D.
stories.story: Had a nice time in Barcelona with my now fiance! The music, the food the culture, we were speachless. watch out for the pick pockets. We had to have a tour of the American Consulate, but thankfully we were able to get back home. Now it is time to plan a wedding.

stories.name: Eliut L.
stories.story: The food! the fashion! Our trip to Paris, France was a dream come true. There is nothing like a freshly baked croissant in the morning with a view of the Eiffel Tower.

stories.name: Cat M.
stories.story: I felt like I was transported back in time! The Colosseum and Vatican City were breathtaking, and the pizza and gelato were out of this world. Don't forget to take a day trip outside of the city for a taste of local life.

stories.name: Madaline F.
stories.story: Lisbon - Colorful, Beautiful, and lively! The city's pastries and live music made for an unforgettable experience. Don't miss the stunning views from Castelo de sao Jorge.

stories.name: Vanessa C.
stories.story: After studying in London my 2nd year of university-I could not wait to go back! The city is just as beautiful as it was when I left. I love this city so much...I highly recommend taking the trip-with family or friends. 2 weeks simply was not enough, but it will do for now.

stories.name: George H.
stories.story: Oktoberfest is a party like no other! The beer tents, and traditional outfits made for an unforgettable experience. And the delicious food -the giant pretzels were the best I have ever had. A trip a don't really remember, but certainly won't forget

stories.name: Sam T.
stories.story: If you have not been to Florence, this city is an art lover's paradise! There was beauty everywhere. And let's not forget the amazing Tuscan cuisine - I still dream about the pasta.

stories.name: Steve S.
stories.story: Porto is A wine lover's paradise! Sipping port while overlooking the Douro River was a highlight of my trip. Ribeira's historic district was also charming and picturesque.

stories.name: Carolina M.
stories.story: If you're a foodie france is a must! the food is everything you've ever dreamed of and more. I'm so happy I got to visit with my husband and kiddos. they loved exploring the streets of paris. A great family vacation with memories that will last a lifetime.

stories.name: Lola M.
stories.story: had the best time celebrating my 60th birthday drinking wine and eating so much delicious food throughout Itália! The trip of a lifetime.

stories.name: luisa C.
stories.story: This city is so cool! The street art scene is amazing, and the nightlife is insane. Our hotel wasnt in the best location. We will be sure to find a place closer to the center of town next time.

stories.name: Carly P.
stories.story: Barcelona - what a Vibrant city with amazing architecture and food. Loved La Sagrada Familia! Cannot wait to go back!

stories.name: Nelson T.
stories.story: it's a city on water - need I say more? The gondola ride through the canals was magical in Venice. The fresh seafood and Venetian wine were also highlights of my trip.

stories.name: Melina C.
stories.story: oh my art! The Museums were absolutely stunning! We found a a lively spot to people-watch in the center of town. But let's talk about the beaches - I still have dreams about them to this day

stories.name: Kelly M.
stories.story: We'll be back no doubt!

stories.name: Kevin S.
stories.story: If you're looking for some fun in the sun Croatia is a must! whether you're on water or on land the party just never stops. I can't wait to go back. pack your sunscreen.

stories.name: Pablo A.
stories.story: The food, the weather, the views...I could go on and on and on about how beautiful this country is. The water is blue, and it's waiting for you!

stories.name: Kimberly B.
stories.story: If you're looking for the perfect girl trip destination? look no further-croatia is the wave!

stories.name: Joao P.
stories.story: Did someone say beach party? Greece is the spot. great food, wonderful people, and memories that will last a lifetime!

stories.name: Ben H.
stories.story: The beer was GREAT! kept us warm on that mountian while we were waiting for some of our buddies to come save us. Still a great time, but I had to deduct some stars.

stories.name: Ashley S.
stories.story: You'll find me on a boat sailing through this beautiful country again next year!

stories.name: Michelle L.
stories.story: If you like good music, good food, beautiful architecture and all around good vibes? book a flight asap!

stories.name: Gordon R.
stories.story: It was nothing like the movie.
